answers.answer: Hello,Masturbation can never cause any damage or weakness of body. The most common psychological problems can generally be related to: inhibited sexual desire, anxiety disorders, depression, mental fatigue, stress, guilt etc.Common causes causing erection problem are stress and anxiety,poor communication with your partner, unrealistic sexual expectations, which make sex a task rather than a pleasure,negative feelings about non performance,smoking, alcohol and sometimes illicit drugs and medical conditions like diabetes, high blood pressure, heart or thyroid conditions, poor circulation, low testosterone, depression, spinal cord injury, nerve damage (for example, from prostate surgery), or neurologic disorders (such as multiple sclerosis or Parkinson's disease).Get evaluated for all these causes from a doctor.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: I'm a 26yr old male, got checked out by doctor last week with a clean bill of health.I've been masturbating 4-6 times per day since 14.  I suspected I've had ED issues since at least 20, but somehow was able to ignore it until recently where I've met a girl who I am starting to care deeply about.Has anyone on this community experienced ED due to excessive masturbation?  I have joined several nofap/abstinence communities and am hoping to hear some success stories.Thank you for your time.
title: 26M with ED from Excessive Masturbation?
